Q1. What does Randy mean when he says “We cannot change the cards we are dealt just how we play the hand?”Ans: We should be satisfied with what we have and make the best out of it. We should not be frustrated when others have more than we do.Q2. What was the essence of the talk the key points covered in the talk?Ans: The main essence of the talk was “Acheivements of childhood dreams”. The key points covered by him were:Childhood dreams.Enabling others to achieve their dreams.Lessons learned in his life.Q3. How many (his) childhood dreams did Randy talk about?Ans: Randy talked about his 6 childhood dreams.They are: Being in zero gravity. Playing in the National Football League.Authoring an article in the World Book Encyclopedia .Being Captain Kirk.To become one of the guys who won the big stuffed toys. To create his imaginary Disney land. Q4. What did Randy say about being specific regarding dreams?Ans: He shared his childhood dreams and explained how he achieved them. According to him everyone should have dreams in their life and should make them come true.Q5. What is the importance of brick walls?Ans: The brick walls are the obstucles in our lives which are not there to keep us out. The brick walls are there to give us a chance to show how badly we want something. Because the brick walls are there to stop the people who don’t want it badly enough. Brick walls let us show our dedication. They are there to separate us from the people who don’t really want to achieve their childhood dreams. Q6. What did Randy learn while pursuing to fulfill his second dream- that of playing in the National Football League?Ans: He approached some famous coaches to fulfil his dream. There he learnt how to practice playing football without a football from coach Graham.It means that it is all about fundamentals. After GrahamCoach Setliff taught him a lot about the power of enthusiasm.He told that he probably got stuff more valuable than playing in NFL.Q7. Why did Randy say that “I am very glad that football has been a part of my life?”Ans: Because he learnt lot of lessons from practicing football. And he meant that he has got more valuable stuff than the players in NFL team. Because he was not sure whether there are doing so great right now or not.Q8. Was Randy sad that he was not able to play for NFL? Why?Ans: Noinfact he was happy about that.Because he learnt more from practicing football even he was not able to play in NFL.Q9.How does Randy accomplish his dream of writing for the encyclopedia?Ans: Ans: After he becamean expert in Virtual Realityhe wrote an article and is available in local library there under V(virtual reality).And later he was selected to be an author in the World book Encyclopedia.Q10. Which quality did Randy learn from the character of Captain Kirk?Ans: Clearly he found the skill set called leadership in him and he learned lot about how to lead people by watching Captain Krik in action.Q11. What important message did Randy convey through his dream of winning stuffed animals?Ans: We can hear cynics fro them. By this he thought how to convince people.Q12. What inspired Randy to become an imaginer?Ans: After his visit to Disney land he wanted to become an imagineer.In his opinion to become imaginer is difficult than to create zero gravity.He also applied for Walt Disney Imagineering.Q13. Explain: Wait long enough and people will surprise and impress you.Ans: We should be patient and wait for others to get best of them. People have different mind sets and show different emotions.So one should not get frustrated for the first time itself when we don’t get what we want from others.Q14. How important is the communication style while trying to say the same thing?Ans: Along with good communicationthere must be good sense of humour to make audience more enthusiastic.There should not be boredom in the lecture like Randy pausch’s.Q15. How did Randy enable others to fulfill their childhood dreams?Ans: He wants everyone to make a plan to fulfil other’s dreams.He helped his friend to make his dream come true.

Dream vacation destinationSince my childhood I always loved to go for world tour as I like travelling. Travelling was one of interests. I still feel the same today. Travelling brings joy and excitement in our lives which we lost in this mechanical world. It boosts our energy to get back to our regular life again with great refreshment if we take some break and go on a trip to some place. I always wanted to do this but have not yet done it.If I could go anywhere in the world I would visit Venice Italy. This wonderful city is built on islands and has no roads just canals.This is a unique city which is not only famous for its scenery but also for its creativity in construction. I have read somewhere that the city is also a symbol of wise government and freedom.I also seen some pictures of the city-Venice in which the building structure was impressive which creates enthusiasm to visit this place. The city is built entirely on water. It clearly reflects the great nature of the place. This attracts the people easily.So I would like to travel to Italy (Venice) and visit as many islands as I can visit. And I will go there and will make my wish come true.

Young people enjoy life more than older people do –Yes I agree that young people enjoy life more than older people do. There are many reasons to support this statement. Every one of us definitely have lot of experiences in our life to think of the meaning behind this statement. This bring a different energy in us.Usually young people are known to be careless reckless and not serious about their lives. People think that they just enjoy life and do not think about any thing else. But actually to say this kind of thinking is wrong. Young people have ore knowledge about our society and surroundings than older people. Older people only think of their generation and do not understand the circumstances and problems of younger people from their end. This leads to conflicts between the two generations. Only few parents understand the situations of their children from their aspect.So I can definitely say that young people enjoy more because they do not have any responsibilities financial problems family problems and any other hard situations. Even though some younger ones have such kind of problems they can face them bravely and move forward in their lives.And the main reason that older people can not enjoy life as much as young people do is that they will become exhausted weighing all the responsibilities being parents guardians of their family members. And one more thing is that their age has already been gone to enjoy life any more.The basic and most important reason behind the statement given is that STUDENT life is the most lovable time in every one’s dairy to enjoy their life. This is the main cause that affect our life enormously from all corners. Being a student can enjoy life in peaks than any other person can do who may be an older one or younger.

From the passage it was clear that University professors may get fame and reputation if they appear in TV. Only few professors get chance to appear in TV and a few utilise their chance.Along with the benefits of being not only a University professor but also TV professor there are some disadvantages too according to the lecture. The main disadvantages are:University professors are not much invited as television professors as university professors are different from TV professors. Because TV professors are known for not only for bringing awareness among people from their lectures but also they entertain the viewers. This can not be done by the University professors as not that entertaining. So the job as a TV professor does not suits them.Professors being TV profesors may not be invited for some good scholastic meetings and programs as they do not appear serious when appear in television.Another disadvantage is that University professors mostly need to do research and give lectures to their students.Also professors who appear in television hardly have time to prepare materials and other required documents necessary for research. And they could not complete even the basic needed works in their personal life because of working for extra hours.

Character: An alien from outer space.a college studentSettingnear a Foresta college libraryTimelate at nightSituation/ChallengeA secret needs to be confessed to someone elseSECRET--(Don’t guess just read)I hope this is the right chance to spill the beans. I have been waiting for this. I really have an interesting secret needs to be confessed to someone else but could not do it as no one believes it for sure. This is my secret.It was my first day as a college student and everything was nice there. As I am a book lover I visited our college library and went through almost all genres. There I found a book about an alien from outer space and stopped there. From the next day I started to read that book daily for some time without fail. I totally addicted to the stories on aliens and read all facts about them. I was becoming curious day by day and decided to find the truth about aliens in real.One fine day late at night I went to a place about which I have read in the books to look for any clues. The place was near a forest which is 40KM from my home and need to cross that forest to reach that spot. I was scared to go into forest alone first but mustered my courage and continued my journey. I almost reached the other end of the forest then suddenly there was a big noise and a very bright light that I couldn’t even open my eyes .After few seconds I tried to open my eyes and got astonished at the next moment.I found a group of some strange creatures in a big spaceship when the spaceship was about to start. In a flash the spaceship disappeared with those aliens. I was literally fainted and fortunately reached home safely at last. It took nearly a month to come out of that shock but I have finally got some satisfaction and felt proud of myself. So this is my story.Now comes the real secret. The greatest secret that I never thought is I have such a good friends who love me a lot but sorry to say so dumb and blindly listen to whatever I say without any sense. You should have guessed it a prank at least by reading about me as a book lover as you know that I’m not but I am glad to have friends like you. Keep smiling….

One Meerkat is to be taken as a sentinel and it should protect other Meerkats.And these mammals performing altrustic acts gain nothing according to the passage. Sources for College Writing Students can draw on a variety of sources to help them with writing assignments. (1) First they can draw on personal experiences. (2) For example for an assignment about communication skills a writer might think about the way he or she communicates through conversations with others while at work or at home. (3) In addition a writer might look at ways he or she communicates with others electronically via email or texting or Facebook. Students might (4) also find examples of written communication skills by looking at skills they’ve learned for previous writing assignments. (5) Second student writers can look for ideas from other people’s experiences. (6) for instance writers can interview other students or even family members. (7) Additionally a writer may have heard others talk about this topic maybe in class. (8) For one thing source would be television shows on the topic of communication. (9) All in all college writers may find that they need to do some research to complete an assignment. (10) On the whole lots of experts have written articles or books on the topic of communication skills. (11) As one can see a search of “communication skills” on the internet might provide useful information; (12) Moreover reference librarians can help students find research materials in special collections or databases. (13) Finally college writers need to be able to draw on a combination of personal experience observations of others and research materials to develop their written assignments.

What does Randy mean when he says “We cannot change the cards we are dealt just how we play the hand?”Randy means that we cannot change the fate of our life(or) we cannot change what going to be happen. We must accept every challenge in our life and try to resolve that challenge in an intelligent manner.What was the essence of the talk the key points covered in the talk?The essence of the talk was that we should be bold and optimistic to accept every challenge in life. The key points covered in this talk are about the fulfillment of speaker`s childhood dreams. How many (his) childhood dreams did Randy talk about?Randy talks about his 6 childhood dreams. They areZero GravityTo be a player in NFLTo be like Captain krikWinning stuffed animalsTo be a Disney designerTo become an author for an article in ENCYCLOPEDIAWhat did Randy say about being specific regarding dreams?In Randy`s point of view dreams which we dream must be achievable and be normal. We should not dream those which ever be not possible.What is the importance of brick walls?--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------.What did Randy learn while pursuing to fulfill his second dream- that of playing in the National Football League?He learnt the fundamentals and Hardwork. He got more experience instead of playing in the team. He quoted a phrase that ”Experience is what you get when you didn`t get what you wanted”.What did Randy learn while pursuing to fulfill his second dream- that of playing in the National Football League?He learnt teamwork and achieved strengths as he practiced without football while learning it.Was Randy sad that he was not able to play for NFL? Why?He assumed that he was not capable as he got only fundamentals in football. So Randy said that he was not able to play for NFL.How does Randy accomplish his dream of writing for the encyclopedia?Randy didn’t not accomplished his dream of writing for the encyclopedia.Which quality did Randy learn from the character of Captain Kirk?He learned Leadership qualities from the character of Captain krik.What important message did Randy convey through his dream of winning stuffed animals?The message that Randy convey through his dream is that there is no age limit for enjoyment and also for fulfillment of dreams.What inspired Randy to become an imaginer?His visit to Disney land inspired Randy to become an imaginer. With that imagination he is able to create a Visual animations.Explain: Wait long enough and people will surprise and impress you.------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------.How important is the communication style while trying to say the same thing?Communication plays an important role while we say something. We should grab the attention of audience with our way of communicating. We should be very clear while describing our thoughts.How did Randy enable others to fulfill their childhood dreams?Randy explains to others that we should be very dedicated in achieving our dreams. In some cases we may not be able to achieve our dream but we will gain some experience from it.

Q)  If you could go on vacation anywhere in the world where would you go and why?A) If I want to go on vacation anywhere in the world I wish to choose VATICAN CITY the city with low population and with low pollution. The total area of that city is approximately 44 hectares with population of 842. More than half of the city is covered with gardens which provide ecofriendly to nature. The city observes a variety of climatic conditions so that we can feel pleasant and comfortable. Buildings such as St. peter`s basilica and the Sistine Chapel are home to some of the most famous art in the world which includes works by artists such as Botticelli Bernini and Michelangelo. The Vatican Library and the collections of the Vatican Museums are of the highest historical scientific and cultural importance. In 1984 the Vatican was added by UNESCO to the List of World Heritage Sites; it is the only one to consist of an entire country.Schools days should be longer or shorter is a controvencial concept. According to the school board the view of increasing amount of hours may lead to the more education for the students. But it is not real in the holistic perceptive. The view of school board is to increase the gradesbut unknowingly the converse of this may happen as per many reports which was stated by National school Boards for public education which states : “Decrease in time would be for the best interest of education”. In our modern world of education the average student ranging from all grades and ages go through a school day of 7-8 hrs. Although these hours are thought to be such a short period of time they are the major cause for high stress within teens as well as loss of value education and sleep which may lead to deterioration of education. “Today`s children are tomorrow`s citizens” can be achieved through only effortless and value based education but not with a regressive approach of learning.

Young people enjoy life more than old people do?Every person`s life is divided into four major categories. They are:Childhood Teenage(young age)Middle ageOld age In every category each individual has some limitations. In childhood limitations are being kept by parents and in middle age we ourselves keep limitations for our children`s sake. The remaining two periods are left to our decisions and our choices. During young age we think there is no one who will stop us but during old age there will be no one to stand with us.The most important and precious part in everyone`s life is teenage (young age). We will eat the fruit in future from the tree that we planted in young age. In my point of view young people enjoy life more than old people do. Because during young age everyone will think only for their sake and there will be no limits for them. I believe that “Today`s old people are also young people in past of their life and also they enjoyed their life”. At certain period these young people will become old and they cannot enjoy at that time.So we should enjoy when we are young. There will be a large number of ways for young people to enjoy but for the old the enjoyment lies in seeing their grandchildren. Some will enjoy by playing games and sports. Some will enjoy by watching movies and going to several places. But we cannot say that young people have to enjoy all the time. There should be some limit for the enjoyment also. The young people should plan or make their way so perfectly to have a bright future along with enjoyment. For example if we consider a family grandparents will not enjoy as much as their grandchild enjoys. So I agree that young people enjoy life more than old people do and I want to add one more point that the output of enjoyment must be a good one.

Sources for College Writing Students can draw on a variety of sources to help them with writing assignments.first they can draw on personal experiences. second for an assignment about communication skills a writer might think about the way he or she communicates through conversations with others while at work or at home. For instance a writer might look at ways he or she communicates with others electronically via email or texting or Facebook. Students might also find examples of written communication skills by looking at skills they’ve learned for previous writing assignments. For another thing student writers can look for ideas from other people’s experiences. For example writers can interview other students or even family members. moreover a writer may have heard others talk about this topic maybe in class. another source would be television shows on the topic of communication. on the whole college writers may find that they need to do some research to complete an assignment. As one can see lots of experts have written articles or books on the topic of communication skills. All in all a search of “communication skills” on the internet might provide useful information; moreover reference librarians can help students find research materials in special collections or databases. Finally college writers need to be able to draw on a combination of personal experience observations of others and research materials to develop their written assignments.

Listening and Note taking: As I understood to concentrate on a lecture listening to it while taking note helps us to remember the topic for longer time. To get the fullest information from the lecture the suggested tips are very useful. The process is divided into three parts as before during and after. Before: We should make sure what was the topic of the lecture is going to be and read it once if we have any doubts note down and take them along. Check where you have got to how you got there where you will go next. The notes may available on some Edu website or power point handouts available on lecturer website take print out lecture notes and use them as reference notes.During: We should not completely rely on lecturer’s notes or in friends because by writing our own notes we will improve our understanding this note taking should include the title and date of lecture in order to review it easily. And should not miss the beginning of lecture because it reviews previous lectures or outlines objectives and lecture structure. We should leave plenty of empty space in the margins so that we can easily add extra points to it. We may not able to note entire lecture but we should make simple note as if we can refer it for many other times use different colour pens to understand notes clearly make relevant examples. Don’t leave the class early the lecturer may repeat the points again. After: Reviewing of notes after the lecture may help to remember the topics for long time.Recopying notes for several times to make notes neater is the waste of time.Discussing notes with friends will help us to remember lecture for long time.
